version_description:
- Change of support email address

Enjoy your racing!

-Added support for F1 2017 game
-Apple Watch support
-Swipe between up to 10 dashes quickly during races
-Full choice of colour customisation for the dashboard screens
-Separate configuration for 15 segment RPM displays
-2017 only dashboards featuring enhanced data available as add-ons

*If you previously purchased v1.x of this app, you may need to unlock dashboards 2-6 before use (done through the 'add dashboard' screen) - you will not need to re-purchase them.

-DRS and flag status add on screen available
-Timing screen improved for iPads to better utilise the screen space
-Timing screen font size improvements
-Various performance improvements and bugfixes

Nothing exciting, just bug fixes this time.

Enjoy your racing!

-More bugfixes
-DRS status now shown on Modern 1
v2.3 ----------------------------------------------------------------
-New modern dashboard style added
-Now you can enter your name in settings to have it displayed on the timing screen
-Up/down buttons for easier RPM adjustments
-Lots of bugs fixed to reduce app crashes (I hope!)
-Support for upcoming F1 2017 v1.8 patch
-iPad Pro 10.5 support
-iOS 11 compatibility

-Fixed some timing screen issues
-Fixed various small display issues
-Fixed DRS Available notification on Modern 1
-Added DRS Activation to Modern 3
v2.3 ----------------------------------------------------------------
-New modern dashboard style added
-Now you can enter your name in settings to have it displayed on the timing screen
-Up/down buttons for easier RPM adjustments
-Lots of bugs fixed to reduce app crashes (I hope!)
-Support for upcoming F1 2017 v1.8 patch
-iPad Pro 10.5 support
-iOS 11 compatibility

-New Modern style dashboard available
-New driver trainer screen now available - monitor wheelspin and wheel locking
-iPhone X support
-Brighter flag colours on Modern Dashboard 3

-New race overview screen with timing
-New car health screen
-Fixed round RPM lights on Modern 3 and Modern 4 dashboards
-Various other little fixes

Enjoy your racing!

-Added interval times between each driver to the Timing 1 screen.
-Added time limited offer to unlock all current and future screens for a one off purchase.
-Improved general app stability.
-Improved the dash selection screen so that you can clearly see what data is included on each dash and see a video of each in action.
-Fixed column alignment issues on Timing 1 on the iPhone X.
-Changed the UI colours for the settings and help sections.
-Fixed the review link on the menu. Please do rate and review the app, it's greatly appreciated.

-Full support for F1 2018 on all dashboards.
-New timing and race overview screens are available for 2018 with a new look. These are included free if you already purchased the 2017 equivalent.
-Added position progress to the timing/race overview screens (2018 only)
-Added SC/VSC to status screen (2018 only)
-Added SC/VSC/VSC delta to Modern 3 and Modern 4 (2018 only)
-Use a button to change between dashboards (you'll need to have your chosen button set to no function in the game) (2018 only)
-Added interval times to the timing screen

-Added a new dash for viewing the current car setup
-Modern 5: Fixed inverted ERS deployment bar, changed tyre temps to internal temps, fixed delta colouring for faster times
-Modern 4, 5, and 6: Sector deltas are now to the overall best sector in qualifying or practice, and your best in races.

-Now supports Forza Motorsport 7 UDP telemetry feed. Try a basic dash for free to check it works on your network, and then you can unlock the rest with a single purchase
-F1: Car Health and LCD5 dashboard now display tyre carcass temperatures in F1 2018 rather than surface
-Support for the newest iPhones
-Support for iOS12

-New screens: Modern 7 dashboard for greater accessibility, design by Daniël, Modern 8, design by Aurèle
-Fixed an issue with the Watch app not functioning correctly with F1 2018
-Fixed an issue with time gaps/intervals updating a sector behind on the timing screens
-Improved updating of 2018 timing screens
-Improved accuracy for 2018 timing
-2018 visual improvements for Timing 2 and Overview 2
-Penalties now shown on Timing 1 and Timing 2
-Lap delta now updates every sector on Modern 4, Modern 5 and Modern 7
-Added DRS and pit status to Modern 5
-Improvements for the new Watches
-Added support for Project CARS/ Project CARS 2

-New Modern 14 dash (F1 2019, 2018, 2017)
-Added Modern 13 for F1 2018 and F1 2017
-Fixed rounded LED shift lights on Modern 12
-Added popups for adjustments to brake bias, diff and mixture on Modern 7 (F1 2018, F1 2019)
-Added popups for adjustments to brake bias and mixture on Modern 7 (F1 2017)
-Added diff adjustments to Modern 13 popups (F1 2018, F1 2019)
-Improved gap accuracy for timing screens (F1 2018, F1 2019)

-Fixed some dash display issues with the iPhone XR
-Various bug-fixes to improve app stability
-Performance and stability improvements

-Modern 9 dashboard
-Bug fixes to improve app stability

Happy racing!

-Modern 10 dashboard for PCARS and FM7
-Fixed delta timing issues on Modern dashboards with F1 2018 and F1 2017
-Fixed best/last lap time display issues on Modern 9
-Fixed pit limiter RPM lights on Modern 9
-Performance improvements for FM7 and PCARS
-Lots of other little fixes

Enjoy your racing :-)

-PCAR2 protocol support
-Timing 3 screen for PCARS2
-Modern 11 for PCARS, PCARS2 - thanks Greg!
-Fixed issues with F1 2018 names in online sessions
-Fixed FM7 fuel level recording
-Fixed chequered flags on PCARS
-Improved F1 2018 tyre temperature update frequency
-Various other tweaks

-PCAR2 protocol support
-Timing 3 screen for PCARS2
-Modern 11 for PCARS, PCARS2 - thanks Greg!
-Fixed issues with F1 2018 names in online sessions
-Fixed FM7 fuel level recording
-Fixed chequered flags on PCARS
-Improved F1 2018 tyre temperature update frequency
-Various other tweaks

-Assetto Corsa support added (data available is limited by the basic UDP implementation in the game itself)
-Fixed gear flash on Modern 8
-SC delta now shows on Modern 5, Modern 6, Modern 7, Modern 8 (F1 2018)
-Added flags to Modern 7 (F1 201x)
-Flashing pit lights added to Modern 9
-These dashboards now remember the last used display mode (thanks for the suggestion Joe!): Modern 1, Modern 2, Timing 1, Modern 4, Timing 2, Overview 2, Modern 10 and Timing 3
-Fixed cycle button press issues for F1 2018, PCARS, PCARS2
-Stability improvements for F1 2017 and F1 2018

-Assetto Corsa support added (data available is limited by the basic UDP implementation in the game itself)
-Fixed gear flash on Modern 8
-SC delta now shows on Modern 5, Modern 6, Modern 7, Modern 8 (F1 2018)
-Added flags to Modern 7 (F1 201x)
-Flashing pit lights added to Modern 9
-These dashboards now remember the last used display mode (thanks for the suggestion Joe!): Modern 1, Modern 2, Timing 1, Modern 4, Timing 2, Overview 2, Modern 10 and Timing 3
-Fixed cycle button press issues for F1 2018, PCARS, PCARS2
-Stability improvements for F1 2017 and F1 2018

-Added support for Forza Horizon 4
-Now you can assign two buttons for dash switching and cycling (2018, PCARS, PCARS2)
-Fixed display issues on Modern 2 (all)
-Fixed last lap display on Modern 1 (FM7)
-Fixed reverse gear display (FM7)

-Improved settings screen
-Improved support functions

-F1 2019 support
-New Timing 4 and Overview 3 screens for F1 2019 with new notifications
-Added Modern 12 and Modern 13 for F1 2019
-Fixed safety car delta showing on Modern 4 for F1 2018
-2018 tyre pressures fixed for F1 games on LCD2
-Car health fixed on Modern 8
-Added boost pressure to LCD2, LCD 3 and Modern 6 for FM7 and FH4
-Other tweaks and improvements
-More to come soon 

Enjoy your racing!

-New Modern 14 dash (F1 2019, 2018, 2017)
-Added Modern 13 for F1 2018 and F1 2017
-Fixed rounded LED shift lights on Modern 12
-Added popups for adjustments to brake bias, diff and mixture on Modern 7 (F1 2018, F1 2019)
-Added popups for adjustments to brake bias and mixture on Modern 7 (F1 2017)
-Added diff adjustments to Modern 13 popups (F1 2018, F1 2019)
-Improved gap accuracy for timing screens (F1 2018, F1 2019)

-Invalidated laps and time penalties now show as a black and white flag on Modern 3, 4, 5, 7, 8, 9, 12 and 13 (F1 2017, 2018, 2019)
-Timing screen optimisations for F1 2018 and F1 2019
-Invalid laps are now shown on Timing 2 and Timing 4 (F1 2018, 2019)
-Retired drivers are now shown on Timing 2, Overview 2, Timing 4 and Overview 3 (F1 2018, 2019)
-Added diff, brake bias and fuel mix popups to Modern 9 (F1 2018, 2019)
-Tyre wear and engine temperature now available (tap to change) on Modern 14 (F1 2017, 2018, 2019)
-Added race position to Modern 14 (F1 2017, 2018, 2019)
-Changed F2 team colours to match 2018 teams (F1 2019)
-Fixed flag display on Modern 7
-Fixed some crashing when racing multiplayer (F1 2018, 2019)
-Fixed crashes on Modern 13

Enjoy your racing!

-Added Modern 15 dashboard for F1 2018 and 2019 (design by Joe)
-Now you can have 3 different dash sequences for each game (thanks to Jake for this)
-Fixed some crashes with PCARS2
-Cumulative lap delta improved for F1 2018 and F1 2019
-Fixed the round LEDs on Modern 5
-Unlocks now flow to your other devices seamlessly
-Invalid laps now don't affect purple sectors for F1 2017

-Fixed an issue with Modern 5 not unlocking correctly for F1 2019
-Fixed a crash when the logo picker is shown on Modern 15 configuration
-Several other bug fixes

-Added a 'RPM bars only' dashboard
-Added brake bias, diff and mixture to Modern 12
-Added interval times to Overview 2 and Overview 3
-iOS 13 compatibility

-iPadOS 13.1 fix for displaying dashboards incorrectly in a window
---
-Added a 'RPM bars only' dashboard
-Added brake bias, diff and mixture to Modern 12
-Added interval times to Overview 2 and Overview 3
-iOS 13 compatibility

-Fixed diff, BB and mix displaying in black text on Modern 12
-Changed the F2 team colours to reflect 2019
-Added DRS to Modern 13
-Fixed lap display on LCD 2 (FM7)

Enjoy your racing!

-You can now enter your name for display on the timing screens in online races (F1 2018/2019)
-Updated F2 team colours for 2019 season
-Tweaks to Modern 9 adjustment popup

Enjoy your racing over the holidays! :-)

Now you can fully customise each RPM light down to the single RPM. You can also pick a custom shift point if required. Multiple profiles can be saved and it's simple to change on a per dash basis.

Enjoy your racing! :-)

-Added Focus Dash (PCARS, PCARS2) - thanks for the design Rick!
-Added Modern 16 dash (PCARS, PCARS2)
-Fixed an issue with the best lap time on Modern 9 (F1 2019)
-Home indicator now autohides on dash screens for X devices
-Fixed issue with RPM profile not being recognised on RPM bar display

-Improved interval and time gap updates on Timing 4 and Overview 3 (F1 2019)
-Improved time gap updates on Modern 8 (F1 2019)
-DRS fix on Modern 14 (F1 2017, F1 2018)
-Fixed a display issue with all dashes on iPad (AC only)
-Visual fixes on Modern 8
-Visual fixes on LCD 2

-FM7 and FH4 now correctly show neutral gear selection
-FM7 laptime improvements and fixes
-Laptime fixes on dash changes

-F1 2020 support
-Timing 5, Overview 4 and Modern 17 dashboards added (F1 2020)
-Speed trap added to Timing 5 (F1 2020)
-Timing 5 shows multiplayer lobby info and final results classifications (F1 2020)
-Speed trap and penalties added to Overview 4 (F1 2020)
-Enhanced DRS lights (F1 2020) - thanks to Travis
-Option added to hide RPM lights (all) - thanks to Travis
-Brake balance, diff and mixture popup added to Modern 15 (F1) - thanks to Craig
-Brake balance, diff and mixture popup added to Modern 5 (F1) - thanks to Tyler
-Option to always show short driver names (F1)
-Numerous other tweaks and fixes

Enjoy your racing! :-)

-F1 2020 support
-Timing 5, Overview 4 and Modern 17 dashboards added (F1 2020)
-Speed trap added to Timing 5 (F1 2020)
-Timing 5 shows multiplayer lobby info and final results classifications (F1 2020)
-Speed trap and penalties added to Overview 4 (F1 2020)
-Enhanced DRS lights (F1 2020) - thanks to Travis
-Option added to hide RPM lights (all) - thanks to Travis
-Brake balance, diff and mixture popup added to Modern 15 (F1) - thanks to Craig
-Brake balance, diff and mixture popup added to Modern 5 (F1) - thanks to Tyler
-Option to always show short driver names (F1)
-Numerous other tweaks and fixes
-Fix to workaround an issue with the release version of F1 2020 on Xbox

Enjoy your racing! :-)

-Fixed text issues on Modern 17 on iPhone 4s (F1 2020)
-Fixed table row issues on Timing 5 (F1 2020)
-Fixed RPM light flashing on Modern 15 when pit limiter is on (F1 2020)
-Fixed the team colour for Haas on timing displays (F1 2019)

Enjoy your racing!

-Track map dashboards (F1 2020, F1 2019, F1 2018)
-Using RPM 1-5 lights is now optional for DRS (F1 2020)
-New app icon - thanks Jamie
-You can now choose from a selection of different app icons
-Added RPM value to Modern 15 (F1 2020, F1 2019, F1 2018) - thanks Joe
-Cars are marked as OUT now when retired on timing screens (F1 2020) - thanks Wally
-Fixed lap and sector deltas (F1 2020) - thanks Dean
-Improved pit in/out display on timing screens (F1 2020)
-Added DRS lights to RPM view (F1 2020)
-Custom player name now appears on timing screens for multiplayer sessions (F1 2020)
-Fixed tyre compound display on Modern 4 (F1 2020)
-Fixed various RPM light display issues (All)
-Fixed Hanoi map not appearing on Overview 4 (F1 2020)

Enjoy your racing!
-Fixes a crash on iOS9 devices when accessing settings

-Race Control screen added with track map, penalties and weather forecasts (F1 2020)
-Fixed an issue with retired cars appearing on the map (F1 2020)
-iOS 14 compatibility
-Added a tip jar for those who wish to further support the app
-Tidied up the settings screen
-Various other tweaks and fixes

Enjoy your racing! :-)

-More data now shown on Race Control screen (F1 2020)
-Suggested gear is now available on all Modern dashes (F1 2020) *requires suggested gear to be enabled in-game
-Fastest lap now highlighted on timing screens during races (F1 2020)
-Overtakes now highlighted on timing screens during races (F1 2020)
-Elimination zone now shown on timing screens for qualifying (F1 2020)
-Fixed an issue with sector 2 not showing purple sectors on Timing 5 (F1 2020)
-Other minor fixes and tweaks

Enjoy your racing!

-Fixed a crash on Timing 3 (PCARS2)
-Fixed fuel mix displaying incorrectly on popup screens (F1 2020)
-ERS display fixes (F1 2020)
-Timing screen tweaks (F1 2020)

Happy holidays, and roll on 2021. Enjoy your racing ;-)

-Added number of pitstops to timing screens* (F1 2020)
-Fixed occasional missing sector times on Timing 5 (F1 2020) - thanks Tony!
-Fixed display issues on iPads on all screens with timing (F1 2020)
-Fixed an issue where retired cars were shown as in the pits (F1 2020) - thanks Wally!
-Various other minor fixes

*only accurate where the app has been running since the start of the race.

Enjoy your racing :-)

-Added driver number to timing screens to help with online identification process (F1 2020)
-Add App Clip to test F1 2020 experience
-Fixed various causes of crashes on the main screen
-Fixed an issue with help screen not re-displaying if requested
-Improved purchasing system behind the scenes
-Various other little tweaks and fixes

Enjoy your racing :-)

-Added driver number to timing screens to help with online identification process (F1 2020)
-Add App Clip to test F1 2020 experience
-Fixed various causes of crashes on the main screen
-Fixed an issue with help screen not re-displaying if requested
-Improved purchasing system behind the scenes
-Various other little tweaks and fixes

Enjoy your racing :-)

-New F1 style dash added (F1 2020, 2019, 2018)
-Revised damage colours on Car Health, Modern 8 and Modern 15
-Added two extra pages to Car Health to highlight tyre temperatures and tyre wear separately
-Fixed issues with circuit and flag display issues on Race Overview screens
-Various other little tweaks and fixes

Enjoy your racing ;-)

-Further improvements to car damage colours (F1 2018, 2019, 2020) - thanks Anis!
-Lots of behind the scenes improvements
-You can now subscribe to the app to unlock all games, or unlock as before on a per game basis

Enjoy your racing ;-).

-New RPM/gear dashboard added for all games
-Added tyre age to Timing 5, Overview and Race Control (F1 2020)

Enjoy your racing ;-)

-New RPM/gear dashboard added for all games
-Added tyre age to Timing 5, Overview and Race Control (F1 2020)

Enjoy your racing ;-)
Added advance notice information that later this year iOS 12 will become the minimum supported version for the app.

-Fixed crashing and performance issues with Timing 5, Overview 4, Track Map 3 and Race Control (F1 2020)

Enjoy your racing ;-)

-F1 2021 support added
-Modern 19, Timing 6, Overview 5, Track Map 4, Race Control 2, Start Lights, Lap Times and Car Health 2 dashboards added (F1 2021)
-Added a new dash navigation method when displaying dashboards (long tap on screen for close, left and right functions)
-Added diff, brake bias and fuel mix popup to Modern 17 (F1 2020)
-Fixed custom name not appearing on timing screens (F1 2018, 2019, 2020)
-Fixed track name issues on Modern 2 (All F1)
-Fixed status text issues on Modern 17 (F1 2020)
-Fixed delta issues on Modern 12 (F1 2019, 2020)
-Fixed pit text on Timing 5 (F1 2020)
-Fixed incorrect time gaps showing on Modern 8 (All F1)
-Fixed time interval issues on Modern 8 (All F1)
-Fixed display issues on LCD 5 (All)
-Lots of other changes and optimisations to assist with future improvements

-Fixed LED lights width on X series devices for Modern dashes (All)
-Fixed crashes on Track Map 4 (F1 2021)
-Improved time gaps/intervals for non-race sessions on timing screens (F1 2018, 2019, 2020, 2021)
-Improved time gaps for Modern 8 (F1 2018, 2019, 2020, 2021)
-Fixed a few other bugs causing app crashes (I hope!)

Plus all this in v5.0 recently:

-F1 2021 support added
-Modern 19, Timing 6, Overview 5, Track Map 4, Race Control 2, Start Lights, Lap Times and Car Health 2 dashboards added (F1 2021)
-Added a new dash navigation method when displaying dashboards (long tap on screen for close, left and right functions)
-Added diff, brake bias and fuel mix popup to Modern 17 (F1 2020)
-Fixed custom name not appearing on timing screens (F1 2018, 2019, 2020)
-Fixed track name issues on Modern 2 (All F1)
-Fixed status text issues on Modern 17 (F1 2020)
-Fixed delta issues on Modern 12 (F1 2019, 2020)
-Fixed pit text on Timing 5 (F1 2020)
-Fixed incorrect time gaps showing on Modern 8 (All F1)
-Fixed time interval issues on Modern 8 (All F1)
-Fixed display issues on LCD 5 (All)
-Lots of other changes and optimisations to assist with future improvements

-Fixed team colours for 2020 seasons on timing screens (F1 2021)
-Fixed tables bouncing on Timing 6, Overview 5, Track Map 4 and Race Control 2 (F1 2021)
-Improvements to Modern 19 (F1 2021)
-Various other little fixes

Plus all this recently in v5.0 and v5.0.1:

-F1 2021 support added
-Modern 19, Timing 6, Overview 5, Track Map 4, Race Control 2, Start Lights, Lap Times and Car Health 2 dashboards added (F1 2021)
-Added a new dash navigation method when displaying dashboards (long tap on screen for close, left and right functions)
-Added diff, brake bias and fuel mix popup to Modern 17 (F1 2020)
-Fixed custom name not appearing on timing screens (F1 2018, 2019, 2020)
-Fixed track name issues on Modern 2 (All F1)
-Fixed status text issues on Modern 17 (F1 2020)
-Fixed delta issues on Modern 12 (F1 2019, 2020)
-Fixed pit text on Timing 5 (F1 2020)
-Fixed incorrect time gaps showing on Modern 8 (All F1)
-Fixed time interval issues on Modern 8 (All F1)
-Fixed display issues on LCD 5 (All)
-Lots of other changes and optimisations to assist with future improvements

-Fixed LED lights width on X series devices for Modern dashes (All)
-Fixed crashes on Track Map 4 (F1 2021)
-Improved time gaps/intervals for non-race sessions on timing screens (F1 2018, 2019, 2020, 2021)
-Improved time gaps for Modern 8 (F1 2018, 2019, 2020, 2021)
-Fixed a few other bugs causing app crashes (I hope!)
